title: I figured out why new GD sucks so much besides the crazy rules and puppet mods
body:
The old GD crew grew up, and we've been hanging around a bunch of middle/high schoolers for the most part.
This is literally what happened. Years ago, the old GD crew was in high school, and now we've grown up, but we're still in the same spot, inhabited mostly by annoying 14 year olds. So it seems like GD died, but it didn't. It's just a new generation of children on it, while the old kids are now grown ass adults who have to listen to the "creative" input of current 14 year olds. GD sucks because we're basically internet babysitters now. 

It's crazy what time actually does.
